Get the latest thoughts & news

Latest updates, from the ATO and TSI Accounting

Immediate deductibility of capital start-up expenses
6 min read

From 1st July this year, new provisions apply to allow certain small businesses, or an entity that is not a business, to immediately claim some start-up costs, including business costs associated with raising capital.

GST on all online transactions from 1st July
9 min read

The (now former) Treasurer recently announced that the States and Territories had unanimously agreed in principle to reduce the GST threshold on imported goods and services (currently at $1,000) to zero.

ATO's apps and other online tools
7 min read

As a result of user feedback, the ATO has improved their ATO Small Business app and it continues to expand in functionality and usability.
